name: Daedalike
description:
Click and drag to place next tile.
WASD or arrows to move.
Bump to attack.

Made for the 7 day broughlike jam. Wasn't able to spend much time
on it during the jam week so it's a bit sparse at the moment. Hopefully
flesh it out a bit when I have time.

Major things I didn't get time to add:
– filling a level is supposed to generate a score item
– a slot to "hold" one tile
– abilities/pickups
– any enemy variation :(

music/sfx by Chris King
